title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
body: hello guys, i have this problem and i tried to follow LOL steps for connections issues, it didnt help me and i still have the problem can you help me please?

replies.body:
Given that you seem to have already tried all of the steps in our Connection Issues Article, I want to clarify where and when you exactly encounter this error message?  Depending on your answer, we may be able to give you more specific troubleshooting steps!

Let me know!
